name: mern-task
description: MERN stack blog application with Redis caching and performance optimizations

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run client:dev" "npm run services:check"
scripts.services:start: npm run services:mongodb && npm run services:redis
scripts.services:mongodb: sudo systemctl start mongod || echo 'MongoDB start failed - may need manual start'
scripts.services:redis: sudo systemctl start redis-server || sudo systemctl start redis || echo 'Redis start failed - may need manual start'
scripts.services:check: npm run services:check:mongodb && npm run services:check:redis
scripts.services:check:mongodb: timeout 5 mongosh --eval 'db.adminCommand("ping")' --quiet || echo '⚠️  MongoDB not available - run: sudo systemctl start mongod'
scripts.services:check:redis: timeout 5 redis-cli ping || echo '⚠️  Redis not available - run: sudo systemctl start redis-server'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint 2>/dev/null || echo 'No lint script in server' && cd ../client && npm run lint 2>/dev/null || echo 'No lint script in client'
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run services:start && echo '🚀 Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start the application'

author: MERN Developer
